EmailTemplate.description: Includes 6 week survey link in SG3
EmailTemplate.name: 04 6 week survey Reminder 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Remember to Share Your {!Contact.Job_Account_Name__c} {!Contact.Program_Name__c} Experiences
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}
Remember to provide us with a short example of how you have applied your {!Contact.Program_Name__c} skills.
Click below to access the survey. http://www.surveygizmo.com/s3/1120228/6-WEEK-POST-PROGRAM-SURVEY?jid={!Contact.Last_Job_ID__c}&pid={!Contact.Last_Participant_Id__c} The survey link is specific to you, please don't forward to others.
NB: If you have already started your survey and have opted to 'save and continue' while in the survey - it is important that you use the link that was sent to you at the time you saved your response, otherwise the above link will open a new survey.
It would be appreciated if you could complete your response by: {!Contact.Job_6_week_case_study_due__c}.
Your ENS facilitator {!Contact.Job_Presenters__c}, will review all responses and a report with their feedback will be provided to the group along with everyone's (anonymous) examples. Click here to see a sample report. http://www.negotiate.org/LiteratureRetrieve.aspx?ID=108529
Kind regards
{!Contact.Job_CSM_Name__c} Client Service Manager
Suite 507, 83 York Street Sydney NSW 2000 Australia p: +61 9299 9688 f: +61 9299 1633 www.negotiate.org
Note this email and any attachments may be privileged and confidential. If you are not the intended recipient please delete the message and notify the sender. Copying or distribution by anyone else is prohibited. Thank you.
